title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 308/80 of 11 February 1980 on the classification of goods under heading No 59.08 of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 308/80  of 11 February 1980  on the classification of goods under heading No 59.08 of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Products known as "articles of velvet", put up in lengths with threads of polypropylene fibres forming the additional warp to a ground fabric of synthetic textile fibres, the base of which is covered by a polypropylene foil, shall be classified in the Common Customs Tariff under heading No:
59.08 Textile fabrics impregnated, coated, covered or laminated with preparations of cellulose derivatives or of other artificial plastic materials.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 February 1980.
For the Commission
Ătienne DAVIGNON
